About The Book

Dive Into HTML5 comprises original prose and graphics licensed under the CC-BY-3.0 license. It is typeset in Essays (LGPL 2.1+, source) and Linux Libertine (GPL 2+ with font exception, source), with public domain illustrations from the Open Clip Art Library and other sources.

Additionally, it includes code from jQuery (MIT), Modernizr (MIT), geo_location_javascript.js (MIT), gears_init.js (BSD), highlighter.js (ASL 2.0), excanvas.js (ASL 2.0), Bespin (MPL), and canvas.text.js (MIT). View full legal notices.

Corrections and feedback to mark@diveintomark.org

Copyright MMIX–MMX Mark Pilgrim
